description: Sakakibara Kouichi transfers to Yomiyama North Middle School class 3-3 after his father is sent to India to do research work. He stays with his aunt and grandparents in Yomiyama while his father is away. He is afflicted with pneumothorax and is hospitalized right before the beginning of the school year and is at first unaware of the strange goings-on in the class. He meets Misaki Mei at school, and unaware of the reasons for her ostracism by the rest of the class, befriends her despite warnings against doing so, and finds himself at the center of mysterious, apparently accidental deaths affecting his classmates and their families.
name: Sakakibara Kouichi
